column4: hi, just downloaded the unreal tournament 2004 demo as "UT2004-LNX-Demo3334.run.gz", how do i install it?
gunzip it, chmod a+x it, then ./it
incidentally, the demo is a bit crashy compared to the current full version, if you're contemplating buying it eventually.
but it works well enough to give you a general idea of the game; just that if it crashes for you sometimes, the full version might well not
